titleStmt.title: A letter of the ministers of the city of London, presented the first of Ian. 1645. to the reverend Assembly of Divines sitting at Westminster by authority of Parliament, against toleration.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Samuel Gellibrand at the Brasen Serpent in Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Wing has 1645[6] publication year; Thomason catalogue lists under 1646.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the Brasen Serpent in Pauls Church-yard
